articles.title: Ceremony for Completion of Apartment Houses for University Educators Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Ceremony for Completion of Apartment Houses for University Educators Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University built in a peculiar style near the Ryonghung Crossroads in Pyongyang were inaugurated on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The twin towers are gifts Marshal Kim Jong Un presented to teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University and proud structures erected thanks to the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and talents. 
					
					 A grand ceremony was held on Wednesday. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju attended the ceremony. 
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Mun Kyong Dok, Kim Yong Jin and servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, teachers and students of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology. 
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made an address. 
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Un, who puts forward the teachers devoting themselves to educating younger generation and training talents of the country as patriots, personally initiated the construction of those houses for educators and energetically led the whole course of their construction. 
					
					 The soldier-builders who undertook the project with loyal resolution to realize the noble intention of the supreme commander performed such feats as successfully completing the project in a short span of time by fully displaying the spirit of devotedly carrying out their tasks, he said, and went on:
					
					 Officials, teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University should successfully implement the Juche-oriented educational idea and policy of the WPK and achieve bigger successes in the education of younger generation and training of talents, bearing deep in mind the profound loving care and trust of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The speaker called on the soldier-builders to stand in the van of the dynamic drive for ushering in a great heyday of construction and build more splendid monumental edifices, bearing deep in mind the deepest trust reposed in them by the supreme commander who projected them as hero unit. 
					
					 He appealed to all people to make a positive contribution to glorifying the country as a highly civilized socialist nation before the whole world, true to the leadership of the WPK. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of all participants. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with senior party and state officials looked round the newly built apartment houses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Teachers and Researchers Who Will Move to New Flats
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Teachers and Researchers Who Will Move to New Flats
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju had a photo session with the teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University who will move to new flats.
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee and chief secretary of Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University, and Kim Thae Hi, chief secretary of the university committee of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un acknowledged the crowds cheering in great excitement.
					
					 He wished the teachers and researchers of the university, patriots devoting their whole lives to bringing up future generations and training talents of the country, highly civilized and happy life in their new flats, hoping that they would devote themselves to education and scientific researches. 
					
					 He expressed the conviction that the teachers and researchers will brilliantly implement the WPK's Juche-oriented idea and policy on education and register bigger successes in educating future generations and training talents, and had a photo session with them.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Joint Naval Maneuvers
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Joint Naval Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement Wednesday:
					 The DPRK's sincere efforts to ensure peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula are now faced with a grave challenge. 
					
					 The U.S. let its nuclear carrier George Washington get involved in the joint naval maneuvers to be staged by it with Japanese and south Korean forces in the South Sea of Korea.
					
					 Gravity of the situation is that the military drills started right after U.S. military authorities flew into south Korea and officially announced "tailored deterrence strategy" targeted against the DPRK, fostering military confrontation and war hysteria.
					
					 The strategy calls for stifling the DPRK by mobilizing all military forces including conventional armed forces of the U.S. and puppet south Korea and missile defense system, not content with the offer of a nuclear umbrella to south Korea by the U.S., the world's biggest possessor of nuclear weapons. It is, in essence, a plan to increase nuclear threat to the DPRK and mount a preemptive nuclear strike at it.
					
					 The military drills planned against this backdrop are a serious military provocation against the DPRK and an outright challenge to the efforts made by the DPRK for peace.
					
					 The DPRK has made positive efforts to check the vicious cycle of tensions and create peaceful environment essential for building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 It made a series of dialogue proposals on its own initiative prompted by the desire to ensure peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and denuclearize it through dialogue and negotiations. It exercised utmost restraint when the U.S. held Ulji Freedom Guardian military exercises with the puppet south Korean forces with the involvement of a nuclear strategic bomber in August.
					
					 Now the U.S. is staging nuclear war exercises by introducing nuclear carrier, rendering the situation extremely tense. 
					
					 The situation proves that it is none other than the U.S. which is harassing peace and escalating the tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. deliberate act of escalating tensions on the peninsula despite the DPRK's patient efforts for peace is aimed to bar the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state, from achieving economic prosperity. This act is also aimed to justify its bolstering of the armed forces to hold a military edge in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 It is precisely for this reason that the U.S. has resorted to military provocations, while persistently shunning the DPRK's just demand for ensuring peace and stability on the peninsula through dialogue and negotiations without preconditions. There is a limit to patience.
					
					 The DPRK loves peace but never begs for it and it is ready for both dialogue and confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK will invariably keep to the road of its own option and surely build a prosperous country on this land, no matter how desperately the hostile forces may try.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK-China friendship association led by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the C.C., the association, left here on Wednesday to take part in the event marking the 55th anniversary of the formation of the associations for friendship between the two countries to be held in Beijing, China.
					 On the same day, the delegation of Kim Chaek University of Technology led by President Hong So Hon returned home after taking part in the forum of presidents and rectors of world universities held in Qingdao, China.
					
					 The delegation of the Thailand International Development Cooperation Agency headed by Director General Piroon Laismit also left here by air.

articles.title: Thai Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Thai Delegation Visits Mangyongdae 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Thailand International Development Cooperation Agency led by Director General Piroon Laismit visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The delegation members looked round the historic relics preserved with good care at the old home of the President in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the revolutionary life of the President and his patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae. 
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the e-library of Kim Chaek University of Technology, etc.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Tours Monument to Party Founding
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Tours Monument to Party Founding
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps here on Wednesday visited the Monument to Party Founding on the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The guests went round the tower, round pedestal and platform erected in a peculiar style, being briefed on the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for the cause of building a revolutionary party and the invincible might of the WPK demonstrating victory and glory under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Pavel S. Leshakov, councilor of the Russian embassy here, wrote in the visitors' book that the Monument to Party Founding is a monumental structure showing the history of the WPK.
					
					 They also visited the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition.
					
					 Yang Zuoyuan, economic and trade councilor of the Chinese embassy, wrote in the visitor's book that he wished Korean people great successes in their efforts to build a thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to C.C., WPK from C.C., CPC
articles.content:
Floral Basket to C.C., WPK from C.C., CPC
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Wednesday.
					
					 A floral basket was sent to the C.C., the WPK in the name of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Wednesday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Placed before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Placed before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea by the economic and commercial councilors' corps, and Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and staff members of his mission, and Jong Il Sim, a widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organization
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Japan on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Tomohiko Murayama, secretary general of the council on a visit to the DPRK, on Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Party, Government Supported by Angolan President
articles.content:
DPRK Party, Government Supported by Angolan President
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyon Il, DPRK ambassador to Angola, presented his credentials to Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, president of the Republic of Angola, on October 3.
					 At the meeting the president extended respects to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is wisely leading the noble drive for ensuring the stability on the Korean Peninsula, achieving the peaceful reunification of Korea and bringing happiness and prosperity to the people, and sincerely wished him good health.
					
					 Angola and the DPRK have supported and cooperated with each other with deep historical relations, he said.
					
					 The DPRK has sincerely supported Angola's cause of independence, he noted.
					
					 I am pleased to see the bilateral relations developing on good terms and cooperation ever expanding in various fields, he added.
					
					 He sincerely congratulated the Korean people on many successes they have made recently under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We support the party and government of the DPRK in their efforts for defending the country's sovereignty and achieving the peaceful reunification and the national prosperity, he stressed.

articles.title: 7th National Exhibition of Scientific Research Successes made by Universities Opens
articles.content:
7th National Exhibition of Scientific Research Successes made by Universities Opens
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The 7th national exhibition of scientific research successes made by universities opened.
					 On display there are products and diagrams, etc. showcasing more than 1 600 research successes presented by over 70 universities including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Huichon University of Technology, Wonsan University of Agriculture.
					
					 The exhibition is divided into 10 panels such as light industry, printing, agriculture, biology, forestry, veterinary science and animal husbandry, poultry farming, metal, new materials, electricity, electronics, automation and basic science.
					
					 The participants in the event will have opportunities to swap successes and experience gained in settling the scientific and technological issues arising in improving the people's living standard and building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 An opening ceremony of the exhibition took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, and teachers, researchers and graduate students from universities across the country.

articles.title: Top Prizes Go to Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia at China Flower Expo
articles.content:
Top Prizes Go to Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia at China Flower Expo 
						
 Beijing, October 8 (KCNA) -- The top prize of exhibits and top prize of designs were awarded to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia at the 8th China Flower Expo. 
					 The expo opened in Jiangsu Province on Sept. 28 which brought together a lot of units from dozens of countries including the DPRK, Netherlands, Thailand and Australia and different parts of China. 
					
					 The DPRK wing where beautiful Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias presented fantastic scenery is crowded with horticulturists from different countries and visitors everyday. 
					
					 The prize-giving ceremony took place on Oct. 5 at which the above-said top prizes were conveyed to the head of the delegation of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee. 
					
					 The expo remains open till Oct. 27.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Mark Birthday of WPK
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Mark Birthday of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting to celebrate the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea at Wonsan port, Kangwon Province on Wednesday.
					 They  laid a bouquet before the mosaic depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing in Wonsan City and  paid tribute to them.
					
					 Captain and crewmen of a Sierra Leonean flagged ship "JIN ZHAO 11" were present at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers recalled that Kim Il Sung proclaimed before the whole world the founding of the WPK, the party of working masses, on October 10, 1945.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The WPK has grown to be an invincible party, firmly preserving the bloodline of Juche despite a stern trial. This would be unthinkable without the indefatigable efforts of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK is now shedding its more brilliant rays as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The speakers wished the Korean people greater success in the work for building a thriving socialist nation and carrying out the cause of national reunification under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at East Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at East Asian Games
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK players are proving successful at the 6th East Asian Games in Tianjin, China. 
					 Rim Jong Sim lifted 117 kg in snatch and 148 kg in jerk in the 69 kg category of women's weightlifting event on Tuesday, setting the new records of the games and winning a gold medal. 
					
					 Kim Un Ju succeeded 113 kg in snatch and 153 kg in jerk in the women's 75 kg category event to bag a gold medal.
					
					 Kim Ok Byol became a runner-up in the women's 75 kg category event to win a silver medal. Choe Hyo Sim came third in the women's 58 kg category event to win a bronze medal.
					
					 Kim Un Hyang came second in women's 10-meter platform diving while Kim Sun Bom and So Myong Hyok came third in men's pair 10-meter platform diving.
					
					 Kim Chun Mi came third in women's 10 000-meter race to win a bronze medal.

articles.title: Songyo Knitwear Factory 50 Years Old
articles.content:
Songyo Knitwear Factory 50 Years Old 
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Songyo Knitwear Factory in Pyongyang marks its 50th anniversary.
					 Established on Oct. 12, Juche 52 (1963), the factory has turned into a modern consumer goods producer thanks to the wise guidance and warm care of the party and the illustrious leaders.
					
					 The factory has made a positive contribution to improving the people's standard of living by producing hundreds of millions of pieces of knitwear for 50 years true to the Workers' Party of Korea's light industrial policy.
					
					 The officials and workers of the factory have always been pace-setters in honoring national economic plans. They carried out their high production quotas even during the Arduous March, forced march.
					
					 Its yearly plans were honored on all indices in recent years.
					
					 The technicians of the factory advanced at least 190 technical innovation proposals and inventions including development of programs for aiding knitwear machines and improvement of devices for feeding yarn to the machines and introduced them into production, improving the quality of products and raising productivity and registering successes in technological updating of equipment and processes.
					
					 The factory has conducted the work for turning it into a modern socialist one, giving face-lift to its appearance.

articles.title: Construction and Reconstruction of Vegetable Greenhouses Make Brisk Headway
articles.content:
Construction and Reconstruction of Vegetable Greenhouses Make Brisk Headway
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The construction and reconstruction of vegetable greenhouses are making brisk headway across the country.
					 Great successes are reported from the projects in Pyongyang City and each province, city (district), county, institution, industrial establishment and cooperative farm.
					
					 The construction of hundreds of greenhouses was completed in a short span of time in Pyongyang.
					
					 Modern arch-style and mud-walled vinyl sheet greenhouses were built at the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District.
					
					 A dynamic drive is now under way in districts and counties of the city including Rangnang, Ryokpho, Hyongjesan, Sunan districts and Kangdong County to build new vinyl sheet greenhouses and reconstruct the existing ones.
					
					 North Phyongan Province set high goals to build dozens of vinyl sheet greenhouses and energetically pressed forward their construction in a short span of time.
					
					 Dozens of greenhouses were completed in South Hwanghae and South Hamgyong Provinces.
					
					 Anju City successfully completed more than ten vinyl sheet greenhouses which do not require heating in a matter of 40 odd days to be a model to be followed by other cities. 
					
					 Many vegetable greenhouses suited to peculiarities of localities appeared in different cities and counties including Kim Chaek, Hoeryong, Tanchon cities and Hamju, Pongchon, Sinchon, Popdong and Anbyon Counties in a brief span of time.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, WPK Founder
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, WPK Founder
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- From his early days of revolutionary activities, President Kim Il Sung had paid big efforts to founding a party which could lead the Korean revolution to victory.
					 He adhered to the principle of independence which suggested building up grassroots organizations before founding the party.
					
					 In line with the Juche-based policy of party founding, he formed the first party organization called the Society for Rallying Comrades in Kalun in July Juche 19 (1930), which involved revolutionaries of new generation. 
					
					 With the first party organization as a parent body, he trained a number of hardcore members to play a role of organizational backbone in founding the party.
					
					 He also paid deep attention to maintaining the purity of the revolutionary ranks and their ideological unity.
					
					 As part of the efforts, he rallied people of various strata around the banner of the anti-Japanese struggle, thus firmly laying mass foundation.
					
					 On the basis of organizational and ideological foundation he had provided during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, he founded the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on October 10, 1945, a few months after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 Hence then, the Korean people could victoriously carry on the revolution and construction under the leadership of the party.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Puppet Group of S. Korea Condemned
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Puppet Group of S. Korea Condemned
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang citizens are being enraged at south Korean Park Geun Hey group's ever more dangerous provocations to the fellow countrymen and national reunification.
					 Rim Jong Sim, Pyongyang citizen, told KCNA says as follows:
					
					 A Korean proverb says "who spits against the wind, fouls his head." 
					
					 This proverb is competent for south Korean chief executive Park Geun Hye who is making a fuss over the statement of the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, criticizing it as "regretful" and "polite demeanor". 
					
					 It reminds everyone of another proverb "thief cries for a thief."
					
					 Since she came into power, she has let loose a string of reckless remarks decrying the dignity and the social system of the DPRK.
					
					 During her overseas tour in June, she called for "disallowing the north's possession of nukes" and described as "something impossible from the beginning" the DPRK's new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 She even went the length of saying that the DPRK should "turn itself into a responsible member of the international community".
					
					 The persistent invectives against the fellow countrymen she made during the overseas trip led her to getting an advice that she had to have "goodwill."
					
					 This gives a glimpse of the ulterior intention of her much-touted "confidence-building process".
					
					  Her intention is to disarm the DPRK in league with outside forces and change its social system by dint of the anti-DPRK international cooperation. 
					
					 In a "commemoration address" she delivered some days ago, she imprudently urged the DPRK to accept "reform" and "opening", babbling that "the north will come to understand itself that nukes and missiles are no longer useful".
					
					 The outcries bereft of reason and discretion have only worsened the north-south relations.
					
					 It seems that she does not ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by her vituperations against the DPRK.
					
					 Now the Park's group are planning to launch a joint military drill involving a U.S. nuclear-powered carrier, after working out together with the United States a "tailored deterrence strategy" against the DPRK.
					
					 It is preposterous for the south Korean puppet group to call for "mutual respect" while running amuck to do harm to the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her group should stop slandering the DPRK at once and repent of the crimes they committed against the national reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Reflect on Their Behavior before Blaming Someone
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Reflect on Their Behavior before Blaming Someone
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Policy Department of the National Defence Commission  of the DPRK (NDC) on October 4  served a warning to Park Geun Hye and her group against their recent reckless remarks hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					 In this regard the Park group is challenging the warning like a thief crying "Stop the thief!", instead of cogitating and drawing a due lesson. Diehard conservative minions of the puppet Ministry of Unification and reptile media are taking the lead in this fuss under the wire-pulling of Park.
					
					  A spokesman for the Policy Department of the NDC gave an answer to the question put by KCNA on Tuesday as regards their moves.
					
					 The statement released by the DPRK this time is the first warning served by its army and people under the situation where the moves of Park and her group to escalate the confrontation with it reached an intolerable phase, the spokesman noted, and continued:
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to seriously consider the above-said statement and prudently reflect on its behavior and opt to rectify it, to begin with.
					
					 Nevertheless, it is becoming more insolent, running the whole gamut of inconceivable means and methods to make clumsy excuses and pretexts and evade the blame for its crimes and hide them.
					
					 An adage says sow the wind and reap the whirlwind.
					
					 The above-said statement would not have been issued if the Park group had done neither such wicked and disgusting things against the north quite contrary to common sense nor evils in violation of moral laws of the nation.
					
					 As soon as the DPRK served the recent warning, the Park group claimed that the inter-Korean relations should be based on the "spirit of mutual respect," terming it "an unreasonable behavior" contrary to human etiquette and morality. It went the lengths of shamelessly urging the north to make "polite demeanor."
					
					 Chiefs in charge of security of the Park regime who claim they are handling policies towards the north and conservative media vied with each other to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK on the basis of false stories. They urged the north "to make changes" and "dismantle its nukes" whenever opportunities presented themselves. Did they do all this in respect of the DPRK?
					
					  The DPRK still remembers how Park invited disgusting human scum to Chongwadae and entertained them to wining and dining, instigating them to confrontation with it at a time when the inter-Korean relations were inching close to the brink of war.
					
					 Fortunately, this time the Park group was right to say when it recalled that the north-south agreement called for refraining from slandering each other but respecting each other.
					
					 If trust and reconciliation were to be promoted between the two sides as they had already agreed, it is necessary to stop slandering the other side, to begin with.
					
					 Frankly speaking, the DPRK has contended so far that it is long since Park and her group were unaware or had forgotten that such points were included in the agreement adopted between the north and the south.
					
					 Otherwise, Park and even conservative media would not have joined in so persistently and malignantly hurling mud at the north in noisy chorus.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the warning served by the DPRK this time is little short of giving Park and her group an opportunity.
					
					 The DPRK has always been lenient towards those who repented of their wrongs and treated them with magnanimity, not asking about their past.
					
					 They would be well advised to seriously reflect on what they did and rectify it before groundlessly blaming someone.
					
					 They should bear in mind that they can claim their titles only when there is no tongue-lashing unbecoming their positions, there is no domestic and foreign public criticism of their rash actions and when there are no wrong assertions and views contrary to people's mind-set.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will not view the Park group's heed to their recent warning as an "act of yielding."
					
					 The DPRK would like to watch the future behavior of Park and her group.
					
					 No rising waves in waning wind.

articles.title: DPRK's Papers Denounce S. Korean Military Drills
articles.content:
DPRK's Papers Denounce S. Korean Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean warmongers started 2013 Hoguk Combined Landing Operation in Pohang in North Kyongsang Province and in waters off it under the cloak of "cultivating capability for combined landing operation".
					 The DPRK's papers on Wednesday carry commentaries in this regard.
					
					 The papers noted that a series of military exercises are apparently aimed at the preemptive attack on the DPRK, an intolerable act of harassing peace, creating a touch-and-go situation and increasing the danger of a nuclear war to the extremes on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun discloses that the south Korean puppet group stage war maneuvers one after another together with the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops to round off the preparations for combined operations with the U.S., its master, and ignite a nuclear war at any cost.
					
					 Terming this a reckless act, the paper goes on:
					
					 The puppet group are brazen-faced enough to clamor about the "north's provocation", while watching for a chance to mount an attack on the north by force of arms day and night. The senseless acts on the part of the puppet group of taking the road of confrontation and war in pursuance of ambition to invade the north with the help of outside forces will precipitate its own ruin.
					
					  The DPRK will not remain a passive onlooker to the reckless acts of the south Korean puppet group as they intensify the military provocations day by day going against the trend for dialogue and peace.
					
					 The DPRK is hardening its determination and will to blow away the stronghold of the provocation with merciless fire-threshing and root out the source of war from this land.
					
					 Minju Joson warns if the south Korean puppet forces, the stooges of the U.S., misjudge the DPRK's sincerity and patience for the improvement of the inter-Korean relation as "weakness" and open fire at the DPRK, they will meet the decisive blows from the enraged army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Denounced for Attempting Nuclear Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Denounced for Attempting Nuclear Attack on DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers held the 45th annual security consultative meeting in Seoul on October 2. They adopted a "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed at a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK. At the meeting the U.S. secretary of Defense accepted the proposal of south Korea to discuss the issue of extending the period for the transfer of the wartime operation control. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 The meeting of the war maniacs at home and abroad clearly shows that the U.S.-south Korea collusion for igniting a nuclear war at any cost on the Korean Peninsula going against the trend of the times has reached the extreme phase. 
					
					 The adoption of the dangerous scenario indicates that an accidental event on the peninsula may lead to a total nuclear war by the warmongers bereft of reason. 
					
					 The north-south relations have been driven to a crisis and dark clouds of nuclear war are being brought to hang over the Korean Peninsula owing to the traitors who sell off the sovereignty to outside forces without any dignity to realize their criminal purpose for stifling the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification are desires of the entire nation and demands of the times. However, the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities openly go against them, getting evermore frantic with the moves to ignite a nuclear war as the days go by. The situation goes to prove that the U.S. and south Korea puppet group are aggressors and criminals who bring war disasters while disturbing dialogue and peace. 
					
					 The DPRK needs peaceful circumstances for turning the country into an economic power and improving the people's living standard. But, there are limits to patience. It is quite natural for the DPRK to take strong countermeasures under the condition that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers dare run amuck to ignite a war against the north for imposing a nuclear disaster upon the Korean nation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Key to Settling Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Key to Settling Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Seven years have passed since the DPRK succeeded in its first nuclear test.
					 The DPRK's underground nuclear test was an unavoidable just option to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation from the ceaseless nuclear threats of the U.S. technically at war with it.
					
					 However, the hostile forces including the U.S. are unilaterally demanding the DPRK take a denuclearization measure first as regards the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula. They are shunning a practical measure for removing the root cause of the nuclear issue on the peninsula and keep mum about it.
					
					 As proven by history and recognized by the world people, the nuclear issue on the peninsula is a product of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK from A to Z as it has persisted for more than a half century.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which provoked a war of aggression to stifle the DPRK, threatened the Korean people with A-bombs and shipped nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					
					 No country in the world has been exposed to undisguised hostile acts and nuclear threats of the superpower for such a long period as the DPRK.
					
					 Even now the U.S. is waiting for a chance to translate its scenario for nuclear attack on the north into reality and staging ceaseless drills for a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 In order to find a solution to the nuclear issue on the peninsula the U.S. which compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes should roll back its hostile policy and completely defuse its nuclear threat. This is the indispensable priority task for settling the nuclear issue.
					
					 The hostile forces should reflect on the historical source and background of the issue and their bad nature of persisting in the anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK with cool head before insisting on their hypocritical assertions of the nuclear issue of the peninsula. Only then will they have the face to talk about "sincerity".
					
					 The U.S. regards the nuclear weapons as a major means for realizing its strategy for domination of the world in the 21st century. It constantly keeps three nuclear strike means on the peninsula and has already adopted the plan of preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK such as "tailored deterrence strategy". Under such situation the prospect of settling the nuclear issue on the peninsula has become dimmer.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can bring the DPRK to its knees with its military threat and blackmail.
					
					 The promotion of the denuclearization of the world will hasten the denuclearization of the peninsula, component part of the denuclearization of the world.
					
					  The denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula is the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and consistent goal of policy of the DPRK government.
					
					 Consistent is the DPRK's stand to ensure the peace and stability on the peninsula and realize the denuclearization through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make all efforts for the peace, stability and denuclearization of the world and remain faithful to its responsibility and duty before the international community.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Implementing October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Implementing October 4 Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in Pusan of south Korea held a rally at the plaza of Pusan Railway Station last Saturday on the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration and declared actions for implementing the north-south joint declaration.
					 The speakers at the meeting charged that the present ruling quarters have no will to implement the October 4 declaration as was the case with the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 These two regimes made the country desolate, though it was once enlivened with the spirit of national reunification and prosperity, they said, and went on:
					
					 If the south-north joint declaration had been implemented, the inter-Korean relations would not have been bedeviled as today.
					
					 The October 4 declaration should be implemented to achieve genuine peace on the Korean Peninsula and national reunification.
					
					 A caravan for peace and national reunification is bound to go ahead though dogs bark, they noted, calling for dynamic actions against the moves of the conservative forces in south Korea to block national reunification and turn back the wheel of history in a bid to strengthen the fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: Fascist Ruling Quarters of S. Korea Slammed for Enforcing Tyrannical Policy
articles.content:
Fascist Ruling Quarters of S. Korea Slammed for Enforcing Tyrannical Policy 
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The "Measure Committee to Denounce the Intelligence Service's Fabrication of Attempted Rebellion Case and Suppression under the Pretext of Security" made up of civic and social organizations of south Korea held a meeting at Jongro District of Seoul on Oct. 5 to assail the fascist repressive rule of the puppet authorities. 
					 Speakers said at the meeting that their attempt to clamp down on all progressive forces finds its expression in cracking down on the Unified Progressive Party. 
					
					 They accused the Park Geun Hye regime of working hard to kill all the people calling for independence, democracy and reunification, adding:
					
					 The regime less than one year old is enforcing a tyrannical policy against all people under the pretext of security. The fascist repressive rule should be stopped at once. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants marched as far as Seoul Railway Station in protest against the present regime which revived the "yusin" fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: Honorary Doctorate in Economics Awarded to Kim Jong Un in Malaysia
articles.content:
Honorary Doctorate in Economics Awarded to Kim Jong Un in Malaysia
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was awarded the degree of honorary doctor of economics from the Help University of Malaysia.
					 A ceremony for conveying the certificate and costume took place in Kuala Lumpur on October 3.
					
					 Present there were public figures of all social standings including the president of the university who is its establisher, the DPRK ambassador to the country and his embassy members.
					
					 The president said it is honor and historic event for his university to award the degree of honorary doctor to Kim Jong Un, who is the first foreign head of state to receive the degree by the university.
					
					 We decided to award the degree to Kim Jong Un who makes untiring efforts for the education of the country and the well-being of its people, the president said, adding that this is the pride of the university.
					
					 He hoped that the cooperation between the DPRK and Malaysia in the field of education would develop in the future.
					
					 The certificate and costume were handed over to the DPRK ambassador.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party Praises Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party Praises Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union released a statement on October 3 on the occasions of the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The history of the WPK is a proud history in which it guided the Korean people in their struggle for the socialist revolution, the building of a thriving nation and the cause of national reunification under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on October 10, 1945 and led the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution, the Fatherland Liberation War, postwar reconstruction and socialist revolution to victory by enhancing the leading position and role of the party in the revolution and construction.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the party-building idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and thoroughly developed the WPK into the party of the leader guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 He made sure that the party firmly maintained the principles of independence and socialism in the struggle for frustrating the anti-socialist moves of the imperialists and reactionaries in the closing year of the past century.
					
					 The party-building ideas of Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK, and Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary, will serve as banner of victory for the world revolutionary people.
					
					 The statement expressed conviction that the Korean people would surely achieve the cause of building a thriving nation and national reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Party-building Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised in Peru, Czech Republic
articles.content:
Party-building Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised in Peru, Czech Republic
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the party-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il took place by the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea on September 30 and October 2. They marked the 16th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 The chairman of the Peruvian group said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung put forward the unique party-founding policy in the early period when he embarked on the road of the revolution, consolidated the organizational and ideological foundation for its realization amid the flames of the anti-Japanese war and founded the party right after the country's liberation and proclaimed its founding to the whole world.
					
					 Kim Jong Il energetically worked to develop the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung from the first period when he started his work at the party central committee.
					
					 The exploits of the peerlessly great men will be immortal as they built the WPK as organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people and Juche-typed revolutionary party without flunkeyism and dogmatism.
					
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association noted:
					
					 The WPK could lead the people along the ever-victorious road by invariably upholding the banner of socialism as the peerlessly great men firmly established Juche in party-building and activities.
					
					 Today the WPK creates a new history of loving the people under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK led by Kim Jong Un will surely accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Lectures and film shows took place in Sweden, Guinea and Thailand between October 1 and 3 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present at the events were personages of the Communist Party in Sweden, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Guinean Art College and the Mariners' Ship and Commerce Co. of Thailand and masses.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and the "Monument to Party Founding".
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of the party, always went among the people to hear their voices and set forth lines and policies fully representing their aspirations and desires.
					
					 It is an iron rule of the WPK to give priority to the interests of the popular masses in all work.
					
					 The popular policies of the WPK were enforced without interruption even in the grimmest period when the country underwent sufferings due to the extreme moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and consecutive natural disasters.
					
					 It is by no means accidental that the Korean people call the WPK mother party.
					
					 The WPK holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem will win only victories, being absolutely supported and trusted by the people as mother party.
					
					  The dean of fine arts faculty of the Guinean college stressed that the key to victories won by the WPK is the guiding idea, steel-like cohesion and unity of the whole party and absolute support and trust of the popular masses.
					
					 The director of Mariners' Ship and Commerce Co. of Thailand affirmed that the WPK would as ever demonstrate its invincible might as it is led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary Marked by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary Marked by Bulgarian Organization
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued a bulletin on October 1 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 An article titled "The WPK marking its 68th anniversary" noted that Kim Il Sung formed the "Down-with Imperialism Union" in the early days when he embarked upon the road of revolution and thus gave the origin to the founding of the new type revolutionary party and firmly provided the organizing and ideological groundwork for founding the party amid the flames of the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 It referred to the fact that celebrations to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK were splendidly held in the presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un and that the DPRK players have registered good successes in the international games amid the hot wind of sports sweeping across the country.

articles.title: Implementation of October 4 Declaration Demanded by Egyptian Political Party
articles.content:
Implementation of October 4 Declaration Demanded by Egyptian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt issued a statement on October 2 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt recognizes that the way for the peaceful reunification and prosperity of Korea lies in implementing the October 4 declaration, and fully supports the declaration together with the world peace-loving people.
					
					 The declaration clearly indicates the ways for definitely turning the north-south relations into those of mutual respect and trust, establishing the lasting peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and expanding and developing the cooperation and exchange between the north and the south in various fields.
					
					 If the declaration had been implemented, a bright vista would have been opened for Korea's reunification.
					
					 But the October 4 declaration has been denied due to the continued anti-reunification moves of the south Korean authorities blindly following the foreign forces, and the danger of confrontation and war have been created on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The denial of the October 4 declaration will only lead to the war and confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities will have to promptly respond to the demands of the Korean people and world peace-loving people desirous of Korea's reunification, away from the stand of persistently denying historic October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Organization for Study of Juche Idea Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Organization for Study of Juche Idea Formed in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The inaugural ceremony of the Russian Kirov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea was held on October 1.
					 Present at the ceremony were followers of the Juche idea in Kirov City.
					
					 The participants watched a documentary about the DPRK.
					
					 They were briefed on the essence, originality and vitality of the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Then a declaration was adopted.
					
					 The declaration expressed full support for the political and economic line of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It said that the association would conduct positive activities to supply the correct information about the DPRK to the Russian people and introduce and disseminate the Juche idea.
					
					 Pavel Andreyevich Chemodanov was elected chairman of the association.

articles.title: Acto inaugural de viviendas para profesores de Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Acto inaugural de viviendas para profesores de Universidad Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 68o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quedaron  inauguradas las viviendas para los profesores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung construidas tipicamente en las inmediaciones de la capitalina encrucijada de Ryonghung.
					Dichas viviendas construidas modernamente formando dos rascacielos son el regalo de amor que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un ofrece a los profesores e investigadores de este plantel docente y la creacion orgullosa lograda por la idea del PTC de dar importancia a la ciencia y al personal competente.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 9 la ceremonia inaugural con la presencia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Mun Kyong Dok, Kim Yong Jin, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y el Instituto Universitario Politecnico Kim Chaek.
					
					Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio un discurso inaugural.
					
					El informante se refirio a que el Mariscal, al evaluar como patriotas a los profesores quienes dedican toda su vida a formar a las generaciones venideras y personas competentes del pais, puso en personal la iniciativa de construir las viviendas para los profesores y condujo con energia todo el proceso de la construccion.
					
					Dijo que los constructores militares movilizados crearon las proezas al terminar magnificamente la construccion de viviendas en un corto tiempo poniendo de pleno manifiesto el impetu de materializar cabalmente  el noble proposito del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios, profesores e investigadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung deben materializar la autoctona idea de educacion y su politica del PTC teniendo presente el gran amor y confianza del Mariscal y alcanzar mayores exitos en la ensenanza de la futura generacion y la formacion de personal competente.
					
					Prosiguio que los constructores militares tienen que edificar mucho mas y magnificamente las creaciones monumentales al frente de la lucha dinamica por abrir la era de prosperidad de la construccion guardando en el corazon la maxima confianza del Comandante Supremo quien presento el EPC como unidad heroica.
					
					Exhorto a todos a contribuir activamente a glorificar la patria como pais civilizado socialista ante el mundo bajo la direccion del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal respondio a las aclamaciones de todos los participantes.
					
					Recorrio las viviendas recien construidas junto con los cuadros del Partido y Estado.

articles.title: Vocero del Departamento de Politica de CDN responde a la ACNC
articles.content:
Vocero del Departamento de Politica de CDN responde a la ACNC
						
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 4, el Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea advirtio a Park Geun-hye y su banda que se portaban males denigrando la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					Pero, en vez de reflexionar y sacar la leccion merecida ante nuestra advertencia, la banda de Park arma alboroto como incendiario que grita !fuego! y los recalcitrantes politiqueros conservadores del Ministerio titere de Unificacion y los venales medios instigados por la gobernadora toman delantera en calumniarla.
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica de CDN de la RPDC dio el dia 8 a la ACNC una respuesta que senala en particular:
					
					La declaracion recien publicada es la primera advertencia de nuestro ejercito y pueblo a Park y su banda que se enfrascaban a las intolerables maniobras de confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					La pandilla de Park deberia escuchar atentamente la susodicha declaracion, reflexionar seriamente y tener el alma de rectificar su idea.
					
					Sin embargo, se comporta mas descortesmente para evadir y apaciguar los crimenes cometidos  valiendose de todos los medios.
					
					Si ella no se hubiera portado tan mal contra la RPDC ni cometido crimenes antieticos, no habria sucedido tal caso.
					
					Park describio erroneamente nuestra advertencia como un "proceder irracional"  contrario a la cortesia y moral del ser humano, diciendo que las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas deben ser basadas en el "espiritu de respeto mutuo" y nos demando descaradamente hacer "palabras y acciones virtuosas".
					
					Los "jefes encargados de seguridad" de Park y prensas conservadoras deshonran la maxima dignidad de la RPDC inventando a porfia los hechos inexistentes y sueltan palabras como "exigencia del cambio" y "renuncia nuclear". ?Tales palabras son hechas respetando a nosotros?
					
					Todavia no olvidamos el mal proceder de Park, quien en el periodo en que las relaciones intercoreanas llegaron al borde de la guerra, invito en Chongwadae a las escorias humanas y preparo para ellas una mesa de comida para instigarles a la confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					Afortunadamente, esta vez Park hablo correctamente de que el acuerdo N-S estipula no difamar ni calumniar reciprocamente sino respetar uno a otro.
					
					Como ya acordado, para promover la confianza y la reconciliacion entre ambas partes coreanas hay que dejar de ofender a su contraparte.
					
					Francamente dicho, venimos pensando en que Park y su pandilla no supieron u olvidaron ya hace mucho tiempo tales articulos de los acuerdos aprobados ya entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Si no es asi, ?como pueden ofendernos tan obstinada y atrozmente Park y los medios de prensa conservadores?
					
					A decir verdad, la presente advertencia es igual que dar una oportunidad a la gobernadora y su banda.
					
					Siempre fuimos generosos a quien se arrepintio de sus errores y le tratamos con  magnanimidad sin preguntarle su pasado.
					
					Antes de reprochar a otro, deberia reflexionarse seriamente de si mismos y portarse bien, lo que es conducto sabio.
					
					Debe tener bien presente que puede mantener su honra solo cuando diga las palabras apropiadas, no haya la censura interior y exterior por sus actos imprudentes ni tenga la insistencia y el criterio contrarios a la opinion publica.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo no consideraran jamas como "obediencia" el consentimiento de la banda de Park en cuanto a la presente advertencia.
					
					Observaremos el comportamiento posterior de Park y su banda.
					
					No se levantara la ola si se calma el viento.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza ejercicios maritimos conjuntos anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza ejercicios maritimos conjuntos anti-RPDC 
						
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 9 la siguiente declaracion: 
					Hoy dia, los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana tropiezan con el grave desafio. 
					
					EE.UU. planeo librar en el Mar Sur de Corea junto con Japon y los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios conjuntos maritimos contra la RPDC e introdujo hasta el portaaviones nuclear.
					
					La gravedad de la situacion es que estos ejercicios libraran inmediatamente despues de que las autoridades de la capa militar de EE.UU. publicaron oficialmente en el territorio surcoreano la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" anti-RPDC intensificando la confrontacion militar y el fervor de guerra.
					
					Este documento planea aplastar la RPDC movilizando todas las fuerzas militares incluyendo las fuerzas armadas convencionales de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos y el sistema antimisiles por falta del ofrecimiento del paraguas nuclear de EE.UU. En su esencia, significa el aumento de la amenaza de guerra nuclear y el cumplimiento del plan de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					Tal peligroso simulacro, que EE.UU. pretende librar con la incorporacion del portaaviones nuclear, deviene una grave provocacion militar y desafio frontal a los esfuerzos por la paz de la RPDC. 
					
					En estos dias, hacemos ingentes esfuerzos por impedir la mala circulacion de la tension y  preparar un ambiente pacifico necesario a la construccion de la potencia economica y a la mejora de la vida del pueblo. 
					
					Partiendo del deseo de asegurar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la desnuclearizacion de toda esta mediante el dialogo y negociaciones, hemos presentado con iniciativa varias propuestas de dialogo y manifestado la maxima paciencia cuando EE.UU. habia librado en agosto pasado junto con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. introdujo ayer el cazabombardero estrategico nuclear, y hoy, el portaaviones nuclear, y agrava al extremo la situacion recrudeciendo incesantemente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear. 
					
					La realidad evidencia que el perturbador de la paz y la estabilidad y agravador de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana es precisamente EE.UU. 
					
					El imperio norteamericano sigue agravando intencionalmente la tension contraviniendo a los sinceros esfuerzos pacificos de la RPDC con el fin de impedir la prosperidad economica de la RPDC, pais con armas nucleares, y al mismo tiempo, justificar el aumento armamentista para tomar la heguemonia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Por lo tanto, EE.UU. niega de todos modos la justa demanda de la RPDC de asegurar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana mediante el dialogo y negociaciones incondicionales y se entrega solo a la provocacion militar.
					
					Tambien la paciencia tiene limite. 
					
					Deseamos la paz, pero no la mendigamos nunca. Y estamos listos tanto para el dialogo como para el enfrentamiento. 
					
					Por mas que se desesperen las fuerzas hostiles, avanzaremos invariablemente por el camino optado por nosotros y levantaremos sin falta un Estado prospero sobre este territorio.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe titulo honorario de doctor en economia de Malasia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe titulo honorario de doctor en economia de Malasia
						
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio el titulo honorario de doctor en economia que le otorgara la Universidad Help de Malasia.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en Kuala Lumpur la ceremonia de entregamiento del titulo honorario y el vestido. 
					
					Participaron el rector y fundador de la universidad y otras personalidades malayas, el embajador y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana en ese pais. 
					
					En la ocasion el rector dijo que la Universidad Help otorga por primera vez al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del pueblo coreano, el titulo honorario de doctor que se concede a los jefes de Estado extranjero, lo cual es el honor de la universidad y un acontecimiento historico. 
					
					Hemos decidido otorgar el titulo honorario de doctor en economia al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien hace incesantes esfuerzos energicos por la educacion del pais y el bienestar del pueblo, subrayo y agrego que esto es el orgullo de la universidad. 
					
					Deseo que se desarrolle la cooperacion en la educacion entre Malasia y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					En el acto fueron entregados al embajador coreano tal titulo honorario y vestido.
